functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Verse 1:\\nThe blacksmith\\nhammers, his forge\\nablaze,\\nCreating weapons, to\\nprotect always,\\nThe farmer tends to\\nthe fields so green,\\nGrowing food for all, a\\nbountiful scene.\\n\\nChorus:\\nWe work together, to\\nkeep our home,\\n"}', '{"text":"A thriving village,\\nnever alone,\\nOur skills are varied,\\nour hearts are true,\\nIn this world of\\nblocks, well see it\\nthrough.\\n\\nVerse 2:\\nThe librarian reads,\\nwith knowledge vast,\\nTeaching our children,\\ntheir minds to cast,\\nThe cleric prays, for"}', '{"text":"blessings divine,\\nGuiding us forward, in\\nlife and in kind.\\n\\nChorus:\\nWe work together, to\\nkeep our home,\\nA thriving village,\\nnever alone,\\nOur skills are varied,\\nour hearts are true,\\nIn this world of\\nblocks, well see it\\nthrough.\\n"}', '{"text":"\\nVerse 3:\\nThe fisherman casts,\\nhis line so strong,\\nBringing in catch, all\\nday long,\\nThe butcher\\nprepares, the meat so\\nfine,\\nCooking and sharing, a\\nfeast so divine.\\n\\nChorus:\\nWe work together, to"}', '{"text":"keep our home,\\nA thriving village,\\nnever alone,\\nOur skills are varied,\\nour hearts are true,\\nIn this world of\\nblocks, well see it\\nthrough.\\n\\nBridge:\\nWe may be small, in this\\nworld so vast,\\nBut our spirits are\\nstrong, well always"}', '{"text":"last,\\nWith each profession,\\na purpose we find,\\nBuilding a future, for\\nall villagerkind.\\n\\nChorus:\\nWe work together, to\\nkeep our home,\\nA thriving village,\\nnever alone,\\nOur skills are varied,\\nour hearts are true,\\nIn this world of"}', '{"text":"blocks, well see it\\nthrough."}'],title:"Lhanswick Town Song",author:"Lhanswick Town Meetup",resolved:"1b",generation:1}

lore.text: You shall teach this song to your children, for it shall last.
